t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Azul Coconut Milk–Unsweetened Coconut Milk, Dairy & Gluten Free, 13.5 Fl. ounce, 12 pack
s: So far I've used it to make coconut curry sauce for chicken, strawberry ice cream, numerous banana smoothies, substitute for milk when baking and homemade chocolate pudding. (The pudding needs a pinch of corn starch to help it thicken, as it's not as rich as whole milk). There's so much you can do with this product, its so versatile. I like that it has a lot of health benefits and it's just very convenient to have in the house. I highly recommend this brand of Azul ...

t: Check out this Amazon review of Azul Coconut Milk–Unsweetened Coconut Milk, Dairy & Gluten Free, 13.5 Fl. ounce, 12 pack
s: It has nearly half the fat and calories of my usual brand (Chaokoh) and lacks most of the flavor. I wish I had noticed this before purchasing but I was just so grateful to find coconut milk that I just went ahead and bought it. I used 3 of the cans right away to make coconut rice and massaman curry. These are recipes that I make regularly and I definitely noticed a change in taste and texture with the Azul ...
